Comment: She went through hell and back with some of the most vile and powerful people. I usually don’t give credence to conspiracy theories, but she definitely still had a target on her back. I feel so terrible for her and her family.
Author: According_To_Me

Comment: After reading an article about her death, I'm still undecided about the manner of her death. She said she was in a serious accident with a bus that caused her to have renal failure and only had 4 days to live. But it was later reported that it was a minor accident with no injuries. Her husband had a protection order against her which she had violated. She was scheduled for a court appearance on the charges at her time of death. So it's quite possible she had some mental problems.
